title: Circle Jerk
description: Moving sounded like a dream come true.New house, new job, new me, right? Not quite.For one, I can’t totally reinvent myself with a kid in tow, so hair dye will have to do.Second, this new adventure brought Knox.You know, the neighborhood jerk and all-around A-hole, Knox Brighton?Or as my son calls him: the circle jerk.Hey, I laughed, too. Obviously, I’m winning at this parenting thing.Anyway, Knox always creeps up at the worst times and leaves a bad taste in my mouth.Until one day, he didn’t. He put his tongue there instead.With that kiss came an offer I couldn't refuse. One that took "faking it" to a new level.Let's hope this fake relationship doesn't lead to any real feelings.
author: K.B. Cinder
